speaker: agent
text: Sir, the purpose of my call is to let you know that your Medicare is getting updated today.

speaker: agent
text: And you were also qualified to receive some additional benefits with no additional cost.

speaker: agent
text: So for the upgradation I do believe you have a Medicare with part A and part B active.

speaker: agent
text: And I'm speaking to [PERSON_NAME], you know you're speaking to him.

speaker: agent
text: So sir, [PERSON_NAME], like you are totally eligible to receive benefits like [PERSON_NAME].

speaker: agent
text: So whenever you visit any [OCCUPATION] or specialists, you don't need to know co payments to your [OCCUPATION], no co payments to your specialist, no hospital fees.

speaker: customer
text: And also you are getting the dental, the vision and the hearing.

speaker: agent
text: And apart from this you were also qualified to receive the medication co payments benefit.

speaker: agent
text: So whenever you visit the drugstore, you don't need to pay for your prescriptions.

speaker: agent
text: And also we are providing you $[MONEY_AMOUNT] money back on your Social Security.

speaker: agent
text: This benefits will be directly added to your existing Medicare Plan [DATE_INTERVAL].

speaker: customer
text: And this benefits will be a [MONEY_AMOUNT] [MONEY_AMOUNT] premium to you sir.

speaker: agent
text: So sir, for the confirmation I have your primary residence with me.

speaker: agent
text: And your zip code is [LOCATION], correct?

speaker: agent
text: And your last name spell is [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME] [PERSON_NAME], right?

speaker: agent
text: And for the confirmation sir, I do believe you can make your own decisions about Medicare.

speaker: agent
text: So sir, like you are totally eligible to receive the benefits.

speaker: agent
text: I will quickly transfer your call to the [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION].

speaker: agent
text: They will just give you a briefing about the benefit and they will send you everything in written to your mailing address so you can read about the benefit as well.

speaker: agent
text: And it will hardly take [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] to connect your call to the [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION].

speaker: agent
text: And they will take your precious [DURATION] [DURATION] of your time.

speaker: customer
text: And I'm there with you on the line, I will introduce you to them.

speaker: agent
text: I really appreciate your time and patience sir.

speaker: agent
text: And for the last confirmation, can you please help me with your date of birth?

speaker: agent
text: Your birth date, the date of birth is [DATE_OF_BIRTH] [DATE_OF_BIRTH], [DATE_OF_BIRTH].

speaker: agent
text: And I do believe you have understood this call is all about your additional Medicare benefits, right?

speaker: agent
text: You both have a wonderful day.
